mapper.select: SELECT ma.message_id,ma.message_is_pulled,ma.message_type,ma.message_generate_time, u.username,a.article_title FROM message_article ma INNER JOIN user u ON ma.message_producer_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN article a on ma.message_related_article_id = a.article_id WHERE ma.message_receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY ma.message_is_pulled DESC
